## NotificationMessageService interface

Represents service that can be used for obtaining notification message component type

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface NotificationMessageService<TCssClasses, TOptions extends NotificationMessageOptions<TCssClasses>> 
```

## Methods

|  Method | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [getNotificationMessageComponent(type)](./notifications.notificationmessageservice.getnotificationmessagecomponent.md) | Gets component type used for displaying notification message |
